means: hearted（放在心上的，铭记在心的）的变形

sentence.Network_en: The light - heartedness of a former time had completely faded.
sentence.Network_cn: 早先的轻松心情都已化为乌有.

sentence.Network_en: Mary never overcame her heavy - heartedness.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛丽从来摆脱不了那副心情沉重的模样.

sentence.Network_en: Feminine light - heartedness sets the tone for the entire collection.
sentence.Network_cn: 女性化的随意感是这一季服饰的整体基调.

auth_sentence.content: To the extent that Raines finds himself guilty of big-heartedness, of course, he can find himself innocent of bone-headedness.
